mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_SECESSION_YN = 'N' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_REGIST_DATETIME , A.MEMBER_SECESSION_DATETIME , A.MEMBER_SECESSION_YN , A.MEMBER_ROLE FROM TBL_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_SECESSION_YN = 'N' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER A ( A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_SECESSION_DATETIME ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL , #{memberId} , #{memberPwd} , #{memberName} , null )
